Site: Tudouke
URL: https://tudouke.com
Summary: Tudouke builds and improves websites and web apps for small businesses and non-technical individuals using AI-assisted delivery with engineering quality checks.

Primary Pages:
- https://tudouke.com/
- https://tudouke.com/how-it-works
- https://tudouke.com/what-we-replace
- https://tudouke.com/faq
- https://tudouke.com/pricing
- https://tudouke.com/about
- https://tudouke.com/contact
- https://tudouke.com/privacy
- https://tudouke.com/terms
- https://tudouke.com/solutions/<slug> (admin-managed SEO landing pages)

Offer Highlights:
- Fast, AI-assisted development with human engineering review.
- Case-by-case scoping and proposal-based pricing.
- Global remote delivery for websites, portals, and workflow apps.
- Focus on stable, maintainable, practical solutions.
- Community support track with pro-bono or heavily discounted options for verified charities and non-profits, subject to capacity.

Notes:
- Case studies page is currently a placeholder and may be noindex until verified examples are approved.
- Marketing content is general information. Project scope and commitments are defined in written proposals.
